title: Lesson 04 - One Minute Irish
description: In lesson 4 of One Minute Irish you will learn how to say that you don't understand something. Remember - even a few phrases of a language can help you make friends and enjoy travel more. Find out more about One Minute Irish at our website - http://www.oneminutelanguages.com

itunes:subtitle: Learn to say that you don't understand something
